SELECT NUM, NAME, CONTENT, CATEGORY, PRICE, STOCK, ORIGIN, MANUFACTURER, SUPPLIER, REGIST_DATE
FROM TBL_PRODUCT <if test="category != null "> WHERE CATEGORY = #{category} </if> ORDER BY REGIST_DATE DESC
FROM (
SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(TBL_BOARD SYS_C007228) */ ROWNUM RN,NUM, NAME, CONTENT, CATEGORY, PRICE, STOCK, ORIGIN, MANUFACTURER, SUPPLIER, REGIST_DATE FROM TBL_PRODUCT
WHERE NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
WHERE NUM LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
WHERE MANUFACTURER LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
WHERE SUPPLIER LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND CATEGORY = '생활'
AND CATEGORY = '생활'
AND CATEGORY = '주방'
AND CATEGORY = '욕실'
AND CATEGORY = '반려동물'
AND CATEGORY = '화장품'
AND CATEGORY = '식품'
AND CATEGORY = '문구'
AND CATEGORY = '원예'
AND (REGIST_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate})
AND ROWNUM <= #{pageNum} * #{amount}
WHERE ROWNUM <= #{pageNum} * #{amount}
)
WHERE RN > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}
SELECT NUM, NAME, CONTENT, CATEGORY, PRICE, STOCK, ORIGIN, MANUFACTURER, SUPPLIER, REGIST_DATE FROM TBL_PRODUCT WHERE NUM = #{num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_PRODUCT ( NUM, NAME, CONTENT, CATEGORY, PRICE, STOCK,ORIGIN, MANUFACTURER, SUPPLIER, REGIST_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_PRODUCT.NEXTVAL,#{name},#{content},#{category},#{price}, #{stock},#{origin},#{manufacturer},#{supplier},SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_PRODUCT SET NAME = #{name}, CONTENT = #{content}, CATEGORY = #{category}, PRICE = #{price}, STOCK = #{stock}, ORIGIN = #{origin}, MANUFACTURER = #{manufacturer}, SUPPLIER = #{supplier}, REGIST_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE NUM=#{num}
